li.p: Run Tests: Open a terminal in your project’s root directory (eg. the incubator-kie-kogito-examples/kogito-quarkus-examples/dmn-pmml-quarkus-example) and execute:
Alternatively, if you installed the Language Support for Java™ by Red Hat extension, run the test from KogitoScenarioJunitActivator.java using the Run Java button in VSCode.

Using the Run Java button provided by Language Support for Java™ by Red Hat, the test results will appear in the native VSCode Test Results window.
